Jim Londos https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Londos 0 Christos Theofilou (Greek: Χρήστος Θεοφίλου; January 2, 1897 – August 19, 1975), better known as "The Golden Greek" Jim Londos (Greek: Τζίμ Λόντος), was a Greek American professional wrestler. Londos was one of the most popular stars on the professional wrestling circuit in the 1930s and 1940s. Christos_Theofilou ( Greek : Χρήστος_Θεοφίλου ; January_2_,_1897 – August_19_,_1975 ) , better_known as " The_Golden_Greek_"_Jim_Londos ( Greek : Τζίμ_Λόντος ) , was a_Greek_American_professional_wrestler . Londos was one of the_most_popular_stars on the_professional_wrestling_circuit in the_1930s_and_1940s .
